## Files.convertJsonDirectorySync() function

Reads all JSON files from a directory and apply a supplied converter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function convertJsonDirectorySync<T>(srcPath: string, options: IDirectoryConvertOptions<T>): Result<IReadDirectoryItem<T>[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  srcPath | string | The path of the folder to be read. |
|  options | [IDirectoryConvertOptions](./ts-json.files.idirectoryconvertoptions.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | [Options](./ts-json.files.idirectoryconvertoptions.md) to control conversion and filtering |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[IReadDirectoryItem](./ts-json.files.ireaddirectoryitem.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;\[\]&gt;
